title: roasted guinea fowl with truffles and leeks
description: This simple recipe would make a great festive dinner for the Christmas holidays for a family who don’t want to make a fuss.
ingredients: 4 breasts guinea fowl (or chicken if you prefer), skin on
2 small black winter truffles, thinly sliced
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 leek or 3 baby leeks, green parts only, thinly sliced
300g/11oz small new potatoes, cut into 5mm thick rounds
2 chervil or flat-leaf parsley sprigs, roughly chopped
